description: Dr. Adam Hamawy is a former U.S. Army combat surgeon currently in Gaza. He said he's treating primarily civilians, rather than combatants: "mostly children, many women, many elderly."
title: A U.S. doctor in Gaza wants President Biden to know 'we are not safe'

description: The handwritten restaurant napkin from the year 2000 was the starting point for an agreement between the then 13-year-old Messi and FC Barcelona.
title: Napkin securing Lionel Messi's first contract fetches nearly $1 million at auction

description: Benny Gantz, a centrist member of Israel's three-member war cabinet, threatened to resign from the government if it doesn't adopt a new plan within three weeks.
title: Member of Israeli war cabinet threatens to quit if Gaza plan doesn't change

description: A helium leak pushed back a planned launch to May 25. Boeing's program that would shuttle astronauts to and from the International Space Station has been plagued with problems.
title: Boeing's troubled Starliner spacecraft launch is delayed again

description: Dabney Coleman, the mustachioed character actor who specialized in smarmy villains like the chauvinist boss in "9 to 5" and the nasty TV director in "Tootsie," has died.
title: Dabney Coleman, who starred in '9 to 5' and 'Tootsie', dies at 92

description: Higher education officials in Ohio are reviewing race-based scholarships after last year's Supreme Court ruling on affirmative action.
title: Ohio reviewing race-based scholarships after Supreme Court affirmative action ruling

description: Skin cancer is the most common cancer in the U.S. and we need all the protection we can get. So why is it so hard to get newer, more effective ingredients approved here?
title: Other countries have better sunscreens. Here's why we can't get them in the U.S.

description: Since the pandemic, chronic absenteeism in the nation's K-12 schools has skyrocketed. These teens are working to get their attendance back on track.
title: These teens were missing too much school. Here's what it took to get them back

description: At the height of the racial reckoning, a school district in Virginia voted to rename two schools that had been previously named for Confederate generals. This month, that decision was reversed.
title: In a debate over a school name, it's not just parents who are attached to the past

description: Meanwhile, Maryland's governor signs a bill to address the surge of conversion devices, including Glock switches, that bypass a pistol's trigger mechanism, allowing the weapon to fire fully automatic.
title: New York proposes a ban on guns that are easy to convert to illegal automatic weapons

description: McCloskey's story has both deep roots and burgeoning relevance. He died this month at 96 and had long been out of the limelight, but the issues he had been willing to champion are as salient as ever.
title: Pete McCloskey's life reminds us how politics long in the past live on in the present

description: As the Houston area works to clean up and restore power to thousands after deadly storms, it will do so Saturday under a smog warning and as all of southern Texas starts to feel the heat.
title: Widespread power outages from deadly Houston storm raise new risk: hot weather
